original_title: Фортеця Маріуполь. Останній день на Азовсталі
overview: Dmytro Kozatsky with the call sign "Orest", head of the press service of the Azov Battalion (Azov Regiment), has been at the Metallurgical Combine Azovstal since the beginning of the siege of Mariupol by the Russian military after their invasion of Ukraine. On the eve of his exit from the shattered factory, he made a farewell film.
title: Fortress Mariupol. The Last Day at Azovstal
